title: League of Legends log in problem...
body:
I have come back from school to play some league of legends when this happens.... The League of Legends server was open for  2 mins in queue then I lost connection. Then I re-opened league and... this message came up "An unexpected error occurred while logging in." Then I tried many times until I came across this website:

http://downdetector.com/status/league-of-legends 

Check it out and explain rito. How do you fix this...

replies.body: Our status page showed that we were having some issues with the authentication servers a few hours ago, but they've since been cleared out and everyone should be able to finally get logged in. Let me know if you're still having issues, and always remember you can check our [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for live updates for any League issues.
